definition.name: NXspm
definition.doc:
Scanning Probe Microscopy (SPM) is a branch of microscopy that utilizes a physical probe to scan the surface of sample and image it at the atomic level.
The application class NXspm is designed as a skeleton and contains common technical concepts for specific SPM sub-techniques such as STM, STS, AFM etc.

field.name: definition
field.doc: Name of the definition that is used for the application.

field.name: experiment_technique
field.doc: The technique of the experiment like STM, STS, AFM, etc.

field.name: scan_mode
field.doc: The mode of the scan. The possible options depend on the type of experiment. For example, in STM, the scan mode could be constant height or constant current, in AFM, the scan mode could be contact mode, tapping mode or non-contact mode.

field.name: scan_type
field.doc: The type of the scan. It mainly describes how scan probe moves in the scan region, e.g. forward, backward, or both (if scan is repeated).

field.name: identifier_experiment
field.doc: The identifiers for the experiment which should be unique at least in lab.

group.doc: Define the program that was used to generate the results file(s) with measured data and metadata.
The instrument information.

group.name: hardware
group.doc: The hardware description of the core instrument setup of the experiment. Usually, the entire instrument is supplied by a single manufacturer. To describe the hardware from any sub-components, use the hardware group of that sub-component (child group of the NXinstrument group) group.

field.name: name
field.doc: Name of the hardware.

field.name: vendor
field.doc: Company name of the manufacturer.

field.name: model
field.doc: Version or model of the hardware setup provided by the manufacturer.

attribute.name: version
attribute.doc: If different versions are possible, the value in this field should be made specific enough to resolve the version.

group.name: software
group.doc: The software description of the core instrument setup of the experiment. Usually, the entire instrument is supplied by a single name/manufacturer/model/etc. To describe the software from any sub-components, use the software group of that component.

field.name: name
field.doc: Name of the software.

field.name: vendor
field.doc: Company name of the manufacturer.

field.name: model
field.doc: Version or model of the component named by the manufacturer.

attribute.name: version
attribute.doc: If different versions are possible, the value in this field should be made specific enough to resolve the version.

group.name: real_time_controller
group.doc: The real-time controller information.

field.name: rcs_frequency
field.doc: The frequency of the real-time controller system which indicated the number of close-loop process (gathering data, process data and update system) control cycles per second.

group.name: lockin_amplifier
group.doc: The lock-in amplifier information.

group.name: scan_environment
group.doc: Information of the scan environment.

field.name: tip_temp
field.doc: Temperature of STM head. Note: At least one field from tip_temp, cryo_bottom_temp and cryo_shield_temp must be provided.

field.name: cryo_bottom_temp
field.doc: Temperature of the cold tail of the cryostat. Note: At least one field from tip_temp, cryo_bottom_temp and cryo_shield_temp must be provided.

field.name: cryo_shield_temp
field.doc: Temperature of liquid nitrogen shield. Note: At least one field from tip_temp, cryo_bottom_temp and cryo_shield_temp.

field.name: scan_name
field.doc: The name of the scan, mainly lab defined, that helps to differentiate among different scans performed in the lab.

group.name: current_sensor
group.doc:
This is a link to the current_sensor under the instrument group: ENTRY[entry]/experiment_instrument/current_sensor.
Note: group name (e.g. entry in ENTRY[entry]) inside the square bracket would be the `exact` name of the NXentry group.

group.name: voltage_sensor
group.doc:
This is a link to the voltage_sensor under the instrument group: ENTRY[entry]/experiment_instrument/voltage_sensor.
Note: group name (e.g. entry in ENTRY[entry]) inside the square bracket would be the `exact` name of the NXentry group.

group.name: piezo_sensor
group.doc:
This is a link to the piezo_sensor under the instrument group: ENTRY[entry]/experiment_instrument/piezo_sensor.
Note: group name (e.g. entry in ENTRY[entry]) inside the square bracket would be the `exact` name of the NXentry group.

The scan control information like scan region or phase space, type of scan (e.g. mesh, spiral, etc.), and scan speed, etc. This group mainly stores the raw scan data. For processed data or final experimental data would go to NXdata group.

field.name: scan_name
field.doc: The name of the scan, mainly lab defined, that helps to differentiate among different scans performed in lab. This field is intended for several types of scan control run under the same environment.

group.name: scan_region
group.doc: The scan region (phase space or sub-phase space) is the region where the scan is performed.

field.name: scan_range_x
field.doc: The range of the scan in x direction.

field.name: scan_range_y
field.doc: The range of the scan in y direction.

field.name: scan_offset_x
field.doc: The offset of the scan in x direction.

field.name: scan_offset_y
field.doc: The offset of the scan in y direction.

field.name: scan_angle_x
field.doc: The angle of the scan region in x direction.

field.name: scan_angle_y
field.doc: The angle of the scan region in y direction.

field.name: scan_start_x
field.doc: The start of the scan in x direction.

field.name: scan_start_y
field.doc: The start of the scan in y direction.

field.name: scan_end_x
field.doc: The end of the scan in x direction.

field.name: scan_end_y
field.doc: The end of the scan in y direction.

group.name: mesh_SCAN
group.doc: The mesh scan is a common technique used in SPM to scan the surface of the sample in a grid pattern.

field.name: scan_points_x
field.doc: The number of points scanned in x direction.

field.name: scan_points_y
field.doc: The number of points scanned in y direction.

field.name: step_size_x
field.doc: The step size in x direction.

field.name: step_size_y
field.doc: The step size in y direction.

group.name: current_sensor
group.doc: Information for current sensor.

field.name: current
field.doc: The DC current between tip and sample.

field.name: current_offset
field.doc: The offset in the tunneling current between tip and sample.

group.name: current_calibration
group.doc: Calibration data of the current sensor.

field.name: coefficients
field.doc: The coefficients of the calibration.

group.doc: An amplifier information for the input signal (e.g. from tip).

field.name: current_gain
field.doc: The gain of the current sensor.

group.name: voltage_sensor
group.doc: The sensor information for the voltage device.

field.name: voltage
field.doc: The DC voltage between tip and sample.

field.name: voltage_offset
field.doc: The offset in the tunneling voltage between tip and sample.

group.name: voltage_calibration
group.doc: Calibration data of the voltage sensor.

field.name: coefficients
field.doc: The coefficients of the calibration.

group.doc: An amplifier information for the input signal (e.g. from tip).

field.name: voltage_gain
field.doc: The gain of the voltage sensor.

group.name: piezo_sensor
group.doc: The piezo sensor refers to the height (or Z) piezo sensor if nothing is mentioned along the X and Y directions.

field.name: x
field.doc: The x position of the piezo. In STS experiment, the piezo stays fixed at x,y and z and the the tunneling current is measured with respect to the bias voltage (sweep voltage).

field.name: y
field.doc: The y position of the piezo.

field.name: z
field.doc: The z position of the piezo.

group.name: piezo_configuration
group.doc: The piezo configuration information like piezoelectric calibration and material properties.

group.name: calibration
group.doc: Calibration of the piezo device.
The positioner information like the position of the tip, the position of the sample, PID loop feedback etc.

group.name: piezo_material
group.doc: The material description and properties of the piezoelectric scanner materials.

group.name: TEMPERATURE
group.doc: A group handling the temperature such as cryo, shield and tip. For different type of temperature sensors repeat this group.

field.name: temperature
field.doc: The temperature of the sample.

field.name: CHANNEL_temp
field.doc: The name of the channel to measure the temperature.

group.name: temperature_calibration
group.doc: Calibration of the temperature measurement.

field.name: coefficients
field.doc: The coefficients of the calibration.

group.name: TEMPERATURE_DATA
group.doc: Data (e.g, record from SPM head temperature) from temperature sensor.

group.name: bias_spectroscopy_environment
group.doc: To explain bias (sweep measurement) voltage applied to the sample.
Setup and scan data for continuous measurement of bias-voltage on the subject of experiment vs tunneling current from probe.
The positioner information like the position of the tip, PID loop feedback etc.

group.name: z_controller
group.doc: The PID controller information for the z-axis.

field.name: z_average_time
field.doc: The average time taken by the z-controller to stabilize the tip.

field.name: z_controller_time
field.doc: The time taken by the z-controller to measure physical properties.

field.name: z_controller_hold
field.doc: The status of the controller to be held on the previous position, before going to the next scan point or line to measure the physical properties.

field.name: record_final_z
field.doc: The status of the controller to record the final z position after the scan.

group.name: bias_sweep
group.doc: The bias voltage sweep is a common technique used on the substance or sample or environment to study the change in the behavior of the sample or substance or environment due to change in applied bias voltage.

group.name: scan_region
group.doc: The scan region (phase space or sub-phase space) is the region where the scan is performed.

field.name: scan_start_bias
field.doc: The start of the bias scan voltage.

field.name: scan_end_bias
field.doc: The end of the bias scan voltage.

field.name: scan_offset_bias
field.doc: The offset of the bias scan voltage.

field.name: scan_range_bias
field.doc: The range of the bias scan voltage.

group.name: linear_sweep
group.doc: The linear sweep is a common technique used on the substance or sample or environment to study the change in the behavior of the sample or substance or environment due to change in applied bias voltage.

field.name: scan_points_bias
field.doc: The number of points scanned in bias voltage.

field.name: step_size_bias
field.doc: The step size in bias voltage.

group.name: sample_bias_voltage
group.doc: The DC bias voltage that is applied to the sample.

field.name: bias_voltage
field.doc: The bias voltage (DC) applied to the sample.

field.name: bias_offset
field.doc: Offset value of the bias voltage.

group.name: bias_calibration
group.doc: Calibration of the bias voltage measurement (V/V).

field.name: coefficients
field.doc: The coefficients of the calibration.

group.doc: The sample information.

group.name: history
group.doc: A set of physical processes that occurred to the sample prior/during experiment.

group.name: sample_environment
group.doc: Information of environment around the sample.

group.name: sample_bias_voltage
group.doc: Link to the sample_bias_voltage sensor under the instrument.
The data group.

field.name: DATA
field.doc: The plot able data (e.g. current, voltage, temperature) field in against of the axis.

group.name: reproducibility_indicators
group.doc: The group of indicators (links to the existing fields in different groups) that measure the reproducibility of the experiment.

group.name: resolution_indicators
group.doc: The group of indicators (links to the existing fields in different groups) that are used to measure the resolution of the experiment results.
